result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Devonte R Phillips

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Devonte R Phillips in court.  Attorney Haley E Wentz in court for Devonte R Phillips.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a Jury Trial (First Call).  Case remains in trial posture.  Parties are ready to proceed. Case passed to address remainder of the Court's calendar.   

Case recalled at 11:42. (Second Call): Same appearances. 
Parties are ready to proceed. Court informs the parties a lower pending case has been selected. 
Court vacated today's Jury Trial and ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 15.
Jury trial scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Devonte R Phillips in Court.  Attorney Haley E Wentz in Court for Devonte R Phillips.  Attorney Navjot Singh Hira in Court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Final PreTrial. Discussion placed on the record. Case remains in trial posture. Court addressed Motions in Limine, Witness Lists, and Jury Instructions. No additional issues need to be addressed at this time. Court ordered case adjourned for Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 15. Jury Trial scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Devonte R Phillips in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a Status Conference.
Defense advises the court case is in trial posture and  request a final pretrial and jury trial dates. 
Court ordered parties to file their Pretrial documents 72 hours in advance of the final pretrial hearing.
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Devonte R Phillips in court.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for a Status Conference.
Defendant in court and advised his counsel is out sick and provided the next court date.
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19.  Defendant advised this hearing will be  streamed Live through dacast- via Zoom.
  Status conference scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Devonte R Phillips in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for a Pretrial Conference.   
Defense counsel recently appointed and awaiting discovery and offer in this case.
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19. This hearing will be streamed Live through DACAST- via zoom.
Status conference scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on April 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered no possession or use of any dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Devonte R Phillips in court.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Kori Ashley, Branch 19.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 19 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Devonte R Phillips
Current: 3259 N 2nd Street Upper, Milwaukee, WI 53212   (Effective: 04-04-2022)
Prior: 2739 North 9Th Street #2, Milwaukee, WI 53206
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 4/4/22 @ 2p
